foreignData.name: Unerschütterlicher Glaube
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst
Wenn der Unerschütterliche Glaube ins Spiel kommt, schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, ins Exil, bis der Unerschütterliche Glaube das Spiel verlässt.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +2/+2.

foreignData.name: Fe incólume
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura que controlas.
Cuando la Fe incólume entre al campo de batalla, exilia la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente hasta que la Fe incólume deje el campo de batalla.
La criatura encantada obtiene +2/+2.

foreignData.name: Foi intacte
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : une créature que vous contrôlez
Quand la Foi intacte arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à ce que la Foi intacte quitte le champ de bataille.
La créature enchantée gagne +2/+2.

foreignData.name: Devozione Incrollabile
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura che controlli
Quando la Devozione Incrollabile entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario finché la Devozione Incrollabile non lascia il campo di battaglia.
La creatura incantata prende +2/+2.

foreignData.name: 揺るぎない信仰
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー）
揺るぎない信仰が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、揺るぎない信仰が戦場を離れるまでそれを追放する。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは＋２/＋２の修整を受ける。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 부서지지 않는 믿음
foreignData.text:
자신이 조종하는 생물에 부여
부서지지 않는 믿음이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 부서지지 않는 믿음이 전장을 떠날 때까지 그 생물을 추방한다.
부여된 생물은 +2/+2를 받는다.

foreignData.name: Fé Intacta
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura que você controla
Quando Fé Intacta entrar no campo de batalha, exile a criatura alvo que um oponente controla até que Fé Intacta deixe o campo de batalha.
A criatura encantada recebe +2/+2.

foreignData.name: Несломленная Вера
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо под вашим контролем
Когда Несломленная Вера выходит на поле битвы, изгоните целевое существо под контролем оппонента до тех пор, пока Несломленная Вера не покинет поле битвы.
Зачарованное существо получает +2/+2.

foreignData.name: 坚贞信念
foreignData.text:
结附于由你操控的生物
当坚贞信念进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到坚贞信念离开战场为止。
所结附的生物得+2/+2。

foreignData.name: 堅貞信念
foreignData.text:
結附於由你操控的生物
當堅貞信念進戰場時，放逐目標由對手操控的生物，直到堅貞信念離開戰場為止。
所結附的生物得+2/+2。

name: Faith Unbroken
originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

rulings.text: If Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the targeted creature won’t be exiled.

Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled, it ceases to exist. It won’t be returned to the battlefield.

The exiled card returns to the battlefield immediately after Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield. Nothing happens between the two events, including state-based actions. However, if the creature Faith Unbroken enchants leaves the battlefield, Faith Unbroken won’t leave itself until state-based actions are checked.

In a multiplayer game, if Faith Unbroken’s owner leaves the game, the exiled card will return to the battlefield. Because the one-shot effect that returns the card isn’t an ability that goes on the stack, it won’t cease to exist along with the leaving player’s spells and abilities on the stack.

text:
Enchant creature you control
When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
